thread.section_title: Days Hotel London- Waterloo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice and Safe Area
thread.title_full: Nice and Safe Area - Review of Days Hotel London- Waterloo, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Karl K
title: Nice and Safe Area
text: My wife and I enjoyed our stay. The room is smaller than usual but we only stayed to sleep. We were always out and checking out London. Perfect for two people. Not enough room for 3. Expect everything here to be in the smaller side compared the the USA. Room is always clean and staff are friendly. I recommend this place.
